name: FetchTaskTemplate
description:
Retrieve the complete record of a specific task template in Asana.

Use this tool to get detailed information about a task template from Asana by providing the task template's GID. Make sure your token has the 'task_templates:read' scope.

parameters.name: task_template_unique_id
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the task template to retrieve its complete record.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the task template.
